title: The World of animals: insects in a garden
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Life cycles (Biology)

description: Episode of Series "Basic Life Science". Uses time lapse and photomicrography to study various insects on a rose bush - aphids, ants, lacewings, and ladybird beetles. Illustrates states in the life cycle of insects; complete metamorphosis in the lacewing and ladybird beetle and incomplete metamorphosis in the aphid. Shows close-up views of ants protecting aphids from ladybird beetles.
related_objects: Series; S01026; Basic Life Science; Active; 1964
